alert.note: Alert for Bibb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 9:47PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Tobesofkee Creek near Macon affecting Bibb County. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tobesofkee Creek near Macon. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 22 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and fields along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Columbus Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM EDT Monday the stage was 21.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:15 PM EDT Monday was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 20 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
